verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Egypt.<WH4714> Behold,<WH2009> the LORD<WH3068> rideth<WH7392> upon<WH5921> a swift<WH7031> cloud,<WH5645> and shall come<WH935> into Egypt:<WH4714> and the idols<WH457> of Egypt<WH4714> shall be moved<WH5128> at his presence,<WH4480> <WH6440> and the heart<WH3824> of Egypt<WH4714> shall melt<WH4549> in the midst<WH7130> of it.

And I will set<WH5526> the Egyptians<WH4714> against the Egyptians:<WH4714> and they shall fight<WH3898> every one<WH376> against his brother,<WH251> and every one<WH376> against his neighbor;<WH7453> city<WH5892> against city,<WH5892> and kingdom<WH4467> against kingdom.<WH4467>

And the spirit<WH7307> of Egypt<WH4714> shall fail<WH1238> in the midst<WH7130> thereof; and I will destroy<WH1104> the counsel<WH6098> thereof: and they shall seek<WH1875> to<WH413> the idols,<WH457> and to<WH413> the charmers,<WH328> and to<WH413> them that have familiar spirits,<WH178> and to<WH413> the wizards.<WH3049>

And <WH853> the Egyptians<WH4714> will I give over<WH5534> into the hand<WH3027> of a cruel<WH7186> lord;<WH113> and a fierce<WH5794> king<WH4428> shall rule<WH4910> over them, saith<WH5002> the Lord,<WH113> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>
And the waters<WH4325> shall fail<WH5405> from the sea,<WH4480> <WH3220> and the river<WH5104> shall be wasted<WH2717> and dried up.<WH3001>

And they shall turn the rivers far away;<WH2186> <WH5104> and the brooks<WH2975> of defense<WH4692> shall be emptied<WH1809> and dried up:<WH2717> the reeds<WH7070> and flags<WH5488> shall wither.<WH7060>

The paper reeds<WH6169> by<WH5921> the brooks,<WH2975> by<WH5921> the mouth<WH6310> of the brooks,<WH2975> and every thing<WH3605> sown<WH4218> by the brooks,<WH2975> shall wither,<WH3001> be driven away,<WH5086> and be no<WH369> more.

The fishers<WH1771> also shall mourn,<WH578> and all<WH3605> they that cast<WH7993> angle<WH2443> into the brooks<WH2975> shall lament,<WH56> and they that spread<WH6566> nets<WH4365> upon<WH5921> <WH6440> the waters<WH4325> shall languish.<WH535>
Moreover they that work<WH5647> in fine<WH8305> flax,<WH6593> and they that weave<WH707> networks,<WH2355> shall be confounded.<WH954>
And they shall be<WH1961> broken<WH1792> in the purposes<WH8356> thereof, all<WH3605> that make<WH6213> sluices<WH7938> and ponds<WH98> for fish.<WH5315>

Surely <WH389> the princes<WH8269> of Zoan<WH6814> are fools,<WH191> the counsel<WH6098> of the wise<WH2450> counselors<WH3289> of Pharaoh<WH6547> is become brutish:<WH1197> how<WH349> say<WH559> ye unto<WH413> Pharaoh,<WH6547> I<WH589> am the son<WH1121> of the wise,<WH2450> the son<WH1121> of ancient<WH6924> kings?<WH4428>

Where <WH335> are they? where<WH645> are thy wise<WH2450> men? and let them tell<WH5046> thee now,<WH4994> and let them know<WH3045> what<WH4100> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> hath purposed<WH3289> upon<WH5921> Egypt.<WH4714>

The princes<WH8269> of Zoan<WH6814> are become fools,<WH2973> the princes<WH8269> of Noph<WH5297> are deceived;<WH5377> they have also seduced<WH8582> <WH853> Egypt,<WH4714> even they that are the stay<WH6438> of the tribes<WH7626> thereof.

The LORD<WH3068> hath mingled<WH4537> a perverse<WH5773> spirit<WH7307> in the midst<WH7130> thereof: and they have caused<WH853> Egypt<WH4714> to err<WH8582> in every<WH3605> work<WH4639> thereof, as a drunken<WH7910> man staggereth<WH8582> in his vomit.<WH6892>
Neither <WH3808> shall there be<WH1961> any work<WH4639> for Egypt,<WH4714> which<WH834> the head<WH7218> or tail,<WH2180> branch<WH3712> or rush,<WH100> may do.<WH6213>

In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall Egypt<WH4714> be<WH1961> like unto women:<WH802> and it shall be afraid<WH2729> and fear<WH6342> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the shaking<WH8573> of the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> which<WH834> he<WH1931> shaketh<WH5130> over<WH5921> it.

And the land<WH127> of Judah<WH3063> shall be<WH1961> a terror<WH2283> unto Egypt,<WH4714> every one<WH3605> that<WH834> maketh mention<WH2142> thereof shall be afraid<WH6342> in<WH413> himself, because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the counsel<WH6098> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> which<WH834> he<WH1931> hath determined<WH3289> against<WH5921> it.

In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall<WH1961> five<WH2568> cities<WH5892> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> speak<WH1696> the language<WH8193> of Canaan,<WH3667> and swear<WH7650> to the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> one<WH259> shall be called,<WH559> The city<WH5892> of destruction.<WH2041>

In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall there be<WH1961> an altar<WH4196> to the LORD<WH3068> in the midst<WH8432> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and a pillar<WH4676> at<WH681> the border<WH1366> thereof to the LORD.<WH3068>

And it shall be<WH1961> for a sign<WH226> and for a witness<WH5707> unto the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> in the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> for<WH3588> they shall cry<WH6817> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the oppressors,<WH3905> and he shall send<WH7971> them a savior,<WH3467> and a great one,<WH7227> and he shall deliver<WH5337> them.

And the LORD<WH3068> shall be known<WH3045> to Egypt,<WH4714> and the Egyptians<WH4714> shall know<WH3045> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> in that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> and shall do<WH5647> sacrifice<WH2077> and oblation;<WH4503> yea, they shall vow<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> unto the LORD,<WH3068> and perform<WH7999> it.

And the LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5062> <WH853> Egypt:<WH4714> he shall smite<WH5062> and heal<WH7495> it: and they shall return<WH7725> even to<WH5704> the LORD,<WH3068> and he shall be entreated<WH6279> of them, and shall heal<WH7495> them.

In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall there be<WH1961> a highway<WH4546> out of Egypt<WH4480> <WH4714> to Assyria,<WH804> and the Assyrian<WH804> shall come<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> and the Egyptian<WH4714> into Assyria,<WH804> and the Egyptians<WH4714> shall serve<WH5647> with<WH854> the Assyrians.<WH804>
In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall Israel<WH3478> be<WH1961> the third<WH7992> with Egypt<WH4714> and with Assyria,<WH804> even a blessing<WH1293> in the midst<WH7130> of the land: <WH776>

Whom <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> shall bless,<WH1288> saying,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be Egypt<WH4714> my people,<WH5971> and Assyria<WH804> the work<WH4639> of my hands,<WH3027> and Israel<WH3478> mine inheritance.<WH5159>
